rules_text:
When Rockbreaker Rhino enters, you may have target creature assign its combat damage this turn as though it weren’t blocked.
Suspend 2–{3}{G} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {3}{G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)[/i]
